p:
Relative frequency of citation is used an index to explore significance or importance of each species occurring in the local area. RFC was determined by “dividing the number of informants” confirming the frequency of citation (FC) by “total number of informants” who participated in survey according formula of Vijayakumar et al., (2015) [ 62, 84– 86].
